summary: Sanjay loves cartoons and comics, while his father tries to draw him into his Hindu traditions. Reluctance turns into awe-inspiring adventure as the boy embarks on an amazing journey, returning with a new perspective they can both embrace.
cast: Brent Schraff|Sunny Singh Attar|Arun Rao|Jaquelynn Herrera
keywords: non comic book superhero|no title at beginning|superhero|cgi animation
title: El superequipo de Sanjay
